content1: Welcome to your personal password manager !
content2: During your time at IU you will be confronted with many different applications. But security is a big issue these days, so it's important not to use the same password for everything.
content3: With Seciure you can keep track of all your credentials. Our browser-based web application allows you to securely store a wide variety of credentials and access them on the go.
content4: With Seciure you can rely on secure and stress-free password management. Have fun with our reliable companion for all your credentials!
autologout: You have been logged out due to inactivity
deleteuser: Your user account has been successfully deleted. All your data has been irrevocably deleted.
